approve(address,address,uint256).details: Function for the funds admin to give ERC20 allowance to other parties

params.token: The address of the token to give allowance from

params.streamId: The id of the stream for which to query the balance.
params.who: The address for which to query the balance.

params.streamId: The id of the stream to cancel.

params.deposit: The amount of money to be streamed.
params.recipient: The address towards which the money is streamed.
params.startTime: The unix timestamp for when the stream starts.
params.stopTime: The unix timestamp for when the stream stops.
params.tokenAddress: The ERC20 token to use as streaming currency.

returns.streamId: the uint256 id of the newly created stream.

returns._0: address The address of the funds admin*

getStream(uint256).details: Throws if the id does not point to a valid stream.

params.streamId: The id of the stream to query.

params.nextStreamId: StreamId to set, applied if greater than 0*

setFundsAdmin(address).details: Transfer the ownership of the funds administrator role. This function should only be callable by the current funds administrator.

params.admin: The address of the new funds administrator

params.token: The address of the token to transfer

params.amount: The amount of tokens to withdraw.
params.streamId: The id of the stream to withdraw tokens from.

ETH_MOCK_ADDRESS().notice: Returns the mock ETH reference address

balanceOf(uint256,address).notice: Returns the available funds for the given stream id and address.Returns the total funds allocated to `who` as uint256.

cancelStream(uint256).notice: Cancels the stream and transfers the tokens back on a pro rata basis.

createStream(address,uint256,address,uin.notice: Creates a new stream funded by this contracts itself and paid towards `recipient`.

getFundsAdmin().notice: Return the funds admin, only entity to be able to interact with this contract (controller of reserve)

getNextStreamId().notice: Returns the next available stream id

getStream(uint256).notice: Returns the stream with all its properties.Returns the stream object.

transfer(address,address,uint256).notice: Function for the funds admin to transfer ERC20 tokens to other parties

withdrawFromStream(uint256,uint256).notice: Withdraws from the contract to the recipient's account.
